SEARCH
Package model

Class Bonus

java.lang.Object
model.Bonus
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bonus extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the various bonuses that a player has and accumulates over time during the gameplay
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bonus()
    The constructor has to be called at the creation of the player.

      public int getCardTypeActionVariation(CardType cardType)
